ctx: intros n0 n q r H.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce pos to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros n0 n q r H.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "S n0" in the current goal.

ctx: intros n0 n q r H.
exceptions.exn: In environment z : nat -> Z n0, n, q, r : nat H : S n0 = q * S n + r H1 : Z Heqz0 : z n = OZ Unable to unify "posOZ r" with "z n0".

original: intros n0 n q r H. unfold pos. unfold multZ. rewrite H. reflexivity.
